decision_conditions: The replacement tree must be planted for T10 Cherry (Prunus spp.) on or near the existing tree by April 2025; the tree should be of a Prunus spp. species and of a size not less than 10-12cm girth when planted.

Reason: To ensure the continued amenity provided by the tree(s) and the planting of an appropriate species. | The tree work specified above must be carried out within 2 years of the date of this decision.

Reason: To ensure the work is only carried out once in respect of this consent and allow Ealing Council the opportunity to reconsider its decision in the light of prevailing circumstances, and reconsult on the case in the event of the consent expiring before implementation.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
TPO/2017/0963 T10 Cherry- Fell as close to ground level as possible 
TPO/2017/0963 T11 - Ash- reduce back from light column by up to 2 metres 
TPO/2017/0963 T12 - Lime- reduce back from light column by up to 2 metres
